p: Ninety-five percent credible intervals were defined as the 2.5% and 97.5% percentiles of the posterior distributions. Parameter estimates for the model for antibody dynamics are given in Supplementary TableÂ 5. Models were compared using the deviance information criterion (DIC). A smaller DIC indicates a better fit. Models with DIC under the smallest DIC+5 were considered equally adequate explanations of the data.
